授業目的:
The purpose of this course is to help students improve their overall writing skills in English. Writing will focus on understanding and writing English paragraphs. Students will learn to follow a process to improve their writing skills. This includes – Prewriting, Writing, and Revising activities.
Course content will help students understand differences in writing styles, such as formal and informal. Students will learn to write for a variety of purposes, including academic and practical. There will be a focus on understanding the organization and parts of written work. Writing activities will also help students improve their critical thinking skills. Students will be able to work with and help their classmates. One of the main writing tasks in semester two will be to write a formal business letter.
到達目標:
• Students will improve their overall writing skills in English.
• Students will learn to use a writing process to improve their writing skills. This includes three steps: Prewriting / Writing / Revising.
• Students will continue to learn about different parts of written work. This includes understanding and writing: Topic sentences / Supporting sentences / Concluding sentences.
• Students will learn to organize and write their ideas in different ways.
• Students will learn to edit their own and others’ written work.
• Students will improve their grammar and punctuation in writing.
• Students will learn about different organizing elements in writing, such as using signal words and phrases.
• Students will learn about different kinds of writing. For example, writing descriptions, comparisons, and opinions.
• Students will learn to write informal and formal letters.
• Students will learn writing skills for a variety of purposes, including practical, academic, and professional purposes.
• Students will improve their ability to work independently (alone) and cooperatively (with others).
• Students will improve their cultural understanding.
• To have a comfortable classroom atmosphere that helps learning and cooperation.
特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
The course will be delivered face to face.
Students will follow a process approach and will need to complete work individually, with some collaborative work.
